SENT.plain: Air embolism may occur following criminal abortion, vaginal douching, powder insufflation as treatment for vaginal infections, and orogenital sex
The patient reported in this work deteriorated following pulmonary barotrauma
Diagnosis was made 16 h after the appearance of neurological signs
She was transferred immediately to the hyperbaric unit
The speed and completeness of recovery are directly related to the prompt diagnosis and commencement of therapy
Failure is more likely related to delay
